thread.title: Drilling Contractor Weatherford Cancels Fund-Raising Effort
thread.title_full: Drilling Contractor Weatherford Cancels Fund-Raising Effort

title: Drilling Contractor Weatherford Cancels Fund-Raising Effort
text:
ryan.dezember@wsj.com Updated Sept. 22, 2015 6:08 p.m. ET 
One of the biggest drilling contractors in the world abandoned its efforts to raise about $1 billion in cash after investors hammered its stock, in sign that Wall Streetâ€™s love affair with energy finance is cooling along with hopes that oil prices will rise anytime soon. 
Weatherford International Ltd. said Monday morning that it planned to sell a combination of shares and convertible bonds for unspecified potential acquisitions. The... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
